F

Feature - Class in shef.mt.features.impl
Feature is an abstract class which models a sentence feature.

FeatureComparator - Class in shef.mt.features.util
A Comparator for Feature objects.
FeatureComparator() - Constructor for class shef.mt.features.util.FeatureComparator
 
FeatureExtractor - Class in shef.mt.enes
FeatureExtractor extracts Glassbox and/or Blackbox features from a pair of source-target input files and a set of additional resources specified as input parameters Usage: FeatureExtractor -input -lang -feat [list of features] -mode [gb|bb|all] -gb [list of GB resources] -rebuild -log
The valid arguments are:
-help : print project help information
-input : the input source and target files
-lang : source and target language
-feat : the list of features.
FeatureExtractor(String[]) - Constructor for class shef.mt.enes.FeatureExtractor
Initialises the FeatureExtractor from a set of parameters, for example sent as command-line arguments
FeatureExtractorSimple - Class in shef.mt.enes
FeatureExtractor extracts Glassbox and/or Blackbox features from a pair of source-target input files and a set of additional resources specified as input parameters Usage: FeatureExtractor -input -lang -feat [list of features] -mode [gb|bb|all] -gb [list of GB resources] -rebuild -log
The valid arguments are:
-help : print project help information
-input : the input source and target files
-lang : source and target language
-feat : the list of features.
FeatureExtractorSimple(String[]) - Constructor for class shef.mt.enes.FeatureExtractorSimple
Initialises the FeatureExtractor from a set of parameters, for example sent as command-line arguments
